src_original: daśadigaṁpomapapaino śarmadhva jaso madhekṛyaḥ || 28 ||  rajagacchava treka vipulo maitrīkarūnamaṁḍalaḥ ||
sarva buddho me mahārājaḥ sarvabuddhātmabhāva dhṛka |
sarva lokeśvarapati sarvavajadharodhipaḥ || 31 ||  sarva buddha mahācikra sarva vaśyama ||  (21) nogatiḥ ||
sarvabuddha mahākāyaḥ sarvabuddha sarasvatiḥ || 32 ||  vanasūryamahāloka vaveṁdū vimalaprabhaḥ ||
